content: join the divine debris newsletter so you never miss a free pattern release 1 > **please note ** this pattern is free to > view on my blog this ad-free > downloadable pdf enables me to be able > to bring you more free patterns in the > future go to the free pattern here 2 **description** home decor is a crocheter s best friend you get the opportunity to make all the lovely and squishy things you want and personalize your home and with a basket you ve got the opportunity to not only add yarn to your house but you also have a new place to store your yarn or next wip it really is a win and with the kieran basket you ve got lots of easy to make texture and a very customizable bottom up basket the pattern calls for 2 colors but you can easily make this in more like a fun stash buster and add more row for even more storage just don t forget to use the smallest hook that you find comfortable so you can keep those sides nice and sturdy this pattern includes written instructions for this design the sample in these photos was made with hue + me from lion brand yarn 3 you may sell all finished products made from this pattern however you may not share sell or distribute this pattern in any way in whole or in part i would greatly appreciate a link back to my shop or this pattern anytime you sell this item online gauge listed in pattern written in us crochet terms you may not use any of the photos from this listing or the ones contained in the pattern to sell your item you must take your own photos do not create a pattern based on my pattern copyright @ divine debris 2022 no part of this document may be reproduced or transmitted in any form by any means electronic mechanical photocopying or otherwise without prior written permission from the author sales of finished product are permitted but designer requests that you link back to pattern and credit divine debris with the original design under the creative commons attribution-share alike license
